title: HOUR 1 - Jimmy G, Joe Burrow, Cowboys, Raiders
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Jimmy G, Joe Burrow, Cowboys, Raiders
description:
Jimmy G is well liked by his Niner teammates

Joe Burrow has overcome a lot

Mike McCarthy tricked his way into being the HC of the Cowboys

Latest on the Raiders HC search

Bill Belichick's coaching tree lacks success


Guest: Peter King
